name: Acurrar
description:
Work as an intern in a game studio, where you have to complete every developer's requests.

Experience the thrilling experience of working with one of the most unsatisfying and unpaid jobs from the entire history.

Deliver coffees, donuts and more to come (take them to the bathroom, make photocopies, give them electronic supplies, etc.)

Planning to:

-Characters with different stats
-Implement special abilities, such as dashing or stopping time.
-More levels
-New mechanics
-Implementing sound
